More Sour Grapes?
First Scottish wine to be produced07 Feb 2010
The first commercially-produced wine from grapes ripened in Scotland is to be launched, if there is enough sunshine.
Pete Gottgens, a top chef, is planning to harvest grapes at his Perthshire hotel later this year, and wants to use them to produce a crisp Riesling.
